0.text: Innate: Vel'Koz's abilities apply a stack of Deconstruction to enemies hit for 7 seconds. Basic attacks and subsequent hits refresh the duration.
0.html: Innate: Vel'Koz's abilities apply a stack of Deconstruction to enemies hit for 7 seconds. Basic attacks and subsequent hits refresh the duration.

1.text: The third stack consumes them all to deal 33 − 169 (based on level) (+ 50% AP) bonus true damage.
1.html: The third stack consumes them all to deal 33 − 169 (based on level) (+ 50% AP) bonus true damage.

0.text:
Active: Vel'Koz fires a plasma bolt in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit,  slowing them by 70% decaying over a few seconds.
Plasma Fission can be recast after 0.25 seconds while the bolt is in flight, and does so automatically upon hitting an enemy or maximum range.
0.html:
Active: Vel'Koz fires a plasma bolt in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit, slowing them by 70% decaying over a few seconds.
Plasma Fission can be recast after 0.25 seconds while the bolt is in flight, and does so automatically upon hitting an enemy or maximum range.

1.text: Recast: The bolt splits in two over 0.25 seconds, each part firing in perpendicular opposite directions.
1.html: Recast: The bolt splits in two over 0.25 seconds, each part firing in perpendicular opposite directions.

2.text: Whenever Plasma Fission kills an enemy, Vel'Koz restores  mana.
2.html: Whenever Plasma Fission kills an enemy, Vel'Koz restores  mana.

0.text: Active: Vel'Koz cracks a rift in the target direction that opens after a 0.25-second delay, cascading through the area over 0.65 seconds to deal magic damage to enemies within.
0.html: Active: Vel'Koz cracks a rift in the target direction that opens after a 0.25-second delay, cascading through the area over 0.65 seconds to deal magic damage to enemies within.

1.text: After 0.75 seconds, the rift violently collapses, dealing magic damage to enemies within and granting  sight of the surrounding area for 0.25 seconds.
1.html: After 0.75 seconds, the rift violently collapses, dealing magic damage to enemies within and granting sight of the surrounding area for 0.25 seconds.

2.text: Vel'Koz periodically stocks a Void Rift charge, up to a maximum of 2.
2.html: Vel'Koz periodically stocks a Void Rift charge, up to a maximum of 2.

0.text: Active: Vel'Koz hurls a disruptive anomaly that lands at the target location after 0.75 seconds, which deals magic damage to enemies hit and  knocks them up and  stuns them for 0.75 seconds, as well as granting  sight of the area briefly.
0.html: Active: Vel'Koz hurls a disruptive anomaly that lands at the target location after 0.75 seconds, which deals magic damage to enemies hit and knocks them up and stuns them for 0.75 seconds, as well as granting sight of the area briefly.

1.text: If Tectonic Disruption is cast close to Vel'Koz, the anomaly will also slightly  knock back enemies hit in the direction of the cast.
1.html: If Tectonic Disruption is cast close to Vel'Koz, the anomaly will also slightly knock back enemies hit in the direction of the cast.

0.text: Passive - Researched: Applying 3  Deconstruction stacks to an enemy  champion will mark them  Researched for 7 seconds, which refreshes on basic attacks and ability hits.
0.html: Passive - Researched: Applying 3 Deconstruction stacks to an enemy champion will mark them Researched for 7 seconds, which refreshes on basic attacks and ability hits.

1.text: Active: After a 0.2-second delay, Vel'Koz  channels for up to 2.6 seconds to project an energy beam, during which he can steer the beam in the target direction. Life Form Disintegration Ray can be recast after 1 second during the channel, and does so automatically after the duration.
1.html: Active: After a 0.2-second delay, Vel'Koz channels for up to 2.6 seconds to project an energy beam, during which he can steer the beam in the target direction. Life Form Disintegration Ray can be recast after 1 second during the channel, and does so automatically after the duration.

2.text: The beam deals magic damage to enemies hit every 0.2 seconds, and  slows them by 20%, lingering for 1 second.  Deconstruction is applied every 0.7 seconds to enemies hit.  Researched enemies take true damage instead.
2.html: The beam deals magic damage to enemies hit every 0.2 seconds, and slows them by 20%, lingering for 1 second. Deconstruction is applied every 0.7 seconds to enemies hit. Researched enemies take true damage instead.

3.text: Recast: Vel'Koz ends Life Form Disintegration Ray.

0.html: Innate: Vel'Koz's abilities apply a stack of Deconstruction to enemies hit for 7 seconds. Basic attacks and subsequent hits refresh the duration.

1.text: The third stack consumes them all to deal 33 − 169 (based on level) (+ 50% AP) bonus true damage.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8 ability power
+10 health
+50% base mana regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Tribute: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants 20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Frostfang, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TRIBUTE: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants  20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

Keywords

  • Economy
  • Gold

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • red

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 ability power
+20 ability haste
+600 mana
+6 magic penetration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Echo: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within 600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ECHO: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within  600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).
